long_description: This summer at the beach, shade your eyes with the men's Cutout Polarized Sunglasses from SunCloud. As well as offering polarized protection, they exude their own cool factor. Choose from black frames with green mirror lenses, or brown frames with brown lenses. Polarized polycarbonate injection-molded lenses cut glare and offer 100% protection from harmful UVA and UVB rays. Grilamid frame material; custom metal logo plaques. Base 8 lens curvature wraps for side coverage. SunCloud Cutout Polarized Sunglasses best fit medium profiles.
short_description: This summer at the beach, shade your eyes with the men's Cutout Polarized Sunglasses from SunCloud. As well as offering polarized protection, they exude their own cool factor.
